title._content: [Union case manufactured by Littlefield, Parsons & Co. showing eagle with Union shield and military weaponary with scroll embellishments] (LOC)

description._content: [Union case manufactured by Littlefield, Parsons & Co. showing eagle with Union shield and military weaponary with scroll embellishments] [between 1858 and 1866] ([Florence, Massachusetts] : Littlefield, Parsons & Co., sole manufacturers of Union cases with embracing riveted hinge, patented, October 14, 1856, & April 21, 1857) 1 item : thermoplastic ; 10.1 x 12.4 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Berg, no. 1-188. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2010; (DLC/PP-2010:105). Format: Union cases--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.27206 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2353
